InfoGrid.title: Empowering Construction Excellence
InfoGrid.description: At PULCATT Rental, we understand the dynamic demands of the construction and event industries. With our extensive inventory of high-quality equipment and commitment to superior service, we’re here to ensure your projects are completed with efficiency and precision. Whether you’re building the future or crafting memorable events, we are is your partner in success.
InfoGrid.itemDes1: Our vast selection of construction and event equipment ensures you have the right tools for every job.
InfoGrid.itemDes2: Get exclusive deals on top-quality equipment for your next project.
InfoGrid.itemDes3: Our deep roots in Houston’s vibrant market mean we understand your needs and are here to support your projects with local insight.
InfoGrid.itemDes4: We offer a specialized transport service covering the entire state of Texas, ensuring safe and efficient transportation regardless of the destination.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Ask us anything about our machinery and its rental, and get clear answers.
FAQ.question1: Do you offer transportation for other machinery?
FAQ.answer1: Yes, the price will depend on the distance and weight of the machinery.
FAQ.question2: Is a trailer needed to transport the machines?
FAQ.answer2: Yes, you must bring a trailer with the adequate capacity for the machine you are renting. We also offer trailer rentals if needed.
FAQ.question3: Can the machine be picked up at the site or establishment?
FAQ.answer4: Yes, a deposit is required to reserve the machine. This amount will be deducted from the final payment, except in the case of the forklift, telehandler, and boom lift, where the deposit will be used as a guarantee.
FAQ.question5: How should the machine be returned?
FAQ.answer5: The machine should be returned in the same condition it was received and with the same fuel level.
FAQ.question6: Do you offer freight transportation services?
FAQ.answer6: Yes, we provide freight transportation from one location to another, including the availability of an operator and a forklift if needed.
FAQ.question7: When is the payment for the machine made?
FAQ.answer7: Payment should be made when the driver delivers the machine or at the moment you pick it up from our establishment.
FAQ.answer8: Yes, we have trained professionals available to operate all machines.
